mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SC.SALEXCEL (DAYSHIFT, WS_CODE, MONTHLYPAY, WEEKLYPAY, BASEPAY, WEEKLYHOLIDAYPAY, INSURANCEDEDUCATION, WITHHOLDINGTAX, AFTERTAXINCOME, AFTERTAXAMOUNT, TAX) VALUES(#{dayshift},'11', #{monthlypay}, #{weeklypay}, #{basepay}, #{weeklyholidaypay}, #{insurancededucation}, #{withholdingtax}, #{aftertaxincome}, #{aftertaxamount}, #{tax})
